sense.def:
Besedo
no
uporabimo, ko na vprašanje odgovorimo nikalno, ko rečemo, da nekaj ni res, ali ko zavrnemo ponudbo ali prošnjo.

seg.quote: ‘Did you see that programme last night?’—‘No, I didn't.’
‘They go round kissing one another when they meet.’—‘No they don't.’

sense.def:
Z izrazom
no
povemo, da se strinjamo z nikalno trditvijo nekoga drugega.

seg.quote: ‘It's not difficult, you see.’—‘No, it must be quite easy when you know how.’

sense.def:
Z besedo
no
izrazimo tudi presenečenje ali razočaranje nad nečem.

seg.quote: ‘Michael's fallen off his bike.’—‘Oh no, not again.’

sense.def:
Izraz
no
uvaja popravek tistega, kar smo pravkar rekli.

seg.quote: ...500 grams, no, a little less than that.

sense.def:
Izraz
no
pomeni, da ni niti enega primerka določene vrste ali niti najmanjše količine nečesa. Na primer, kadar človek
has no job
ali
has no money
, to pomeni, da nima službe ali da nima nič denarja.

seg.quote: I do it all on my own. I have no help at all.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
no
poudarimo, da nekdo ali nekaj ni določene vrste. Kadar rečemo, da nekdo
is no fool
, povemo, da nikakor ni bedak.

seg.quote: She is no friend of mine.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
no
poudarimo, da nekaj ne presega določene količine ali števila ali da nima določene lastnosti v večjem obsegu kot neka druga stvar. Na primer, nekaj, kar je
no bigger than a fingernail
, ni nič večje od nohta.

seg.quote: The whole gun was no longer than eighteen inches.
Winners will be notified by post no later than 31st August.
...a job that was no better than a common labourer's.

sense.def:
No
pomeni tudi, zlasti v opozorilih, da je nekaj prepovedano.

Kadar rečemo
there is no doing a particular thing
, to pomeni, da po našem mnenju tistega ni mogoče narediti.

seg.quote: There's no arguing with my father.
